reply_to.body: Wait what do you mean by how to use? like how to call or how to join coversations ect
reply_to.body_tagged: Wait what do you mean by how to use? like how to call or how to join coversations ect

replies.body: Do you have an account and the program installed?
replies.body_tagged: Do you have an account and the program installed?

replies.body:
On the computer, you can create your account by downloading Skype, or signing up online ^~^ 

Once you have made an account (self explanatory ^~^) you can download Skype on your computer, sign in, and start adding people by using the search bar! ;D 

It just takes awhile to get used to ^~^ You just have to mess around with it ^~^ 

So there is no "instructions" set to tell you, but you just have to mess around with it, and explore it ;D It'll get easier after awhile!
replies.body_tagged:
On the computer, you can create your account by downloading Skype, or signing up online ^~^ 

Once you have made an account (self explanatory ^~^) you can download Skype on your computer, sign in, and start adding people by using the search bar! ;D 

It just takes awhile to get used to ^~^ You just have to mess around with it ^~^ 

So there is no "instructions" set to tell you, but you just have to mess around with it, and explore it ;D It'll get easier after awhile!

replies.body: You have to add a contact before you can start a call, so once you get a contact ^~^ you click on they're name, and click the green button that says "Call", and there ya go! ;D
replies.body_tagged: You have to add a contact before you can start a call, so once you get a contact ^~^ you click on they're name, and click the green button that says "Call", and there ya go! ;D

replies.body:
You just create an account on Skype (: so that you can set your username and details ^~^

You can either access the website, or you can launch your Skype Icon and click "Create an Account", and continue from there ^~^
replies.body_tagged:
